review:
Careful- Careful- Careful:-
I read the positive reviews and visited doctor in this clinic. * **** *** *** ** *** ******* ****** * **** **** ***** **** *** **** ***** ** ****** Dr anirban and their staffs will convince you for diabetes reversal program. They will charge u 15,000. After paying the money there is no responsibility. Doctor will advice you to buy very expensive injection . ** **** ** **** *** * **** ****** His staffs members will assure you if there is no benefit youe money will be refunded. Forget money, * *** ******** ** *** ***** ****** ******* ** **** ******* *** ***** ******* 
Pathetic experience. Do not invest your money here. Do not just  trust on positive reviews and videos . ****** **** ***** *** ** ***** *** ***** ******** ******** You will be not having any choice left because you are getting treated there. 
So be careful my friends and save your money yourself * ***** ***** ****

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
He is totally a different doctor. He prescribes the medicines, exactly what is required. He rather focuses more on Life style change. He makes patients understand the side effect of taking excess medicines. A Feel Good factor works after visiting him. His treatment is similar to treatment of developed countries. 
It is very sad that doctors in India do prescribe a lot of medicines. The patients fear to visit the doctor again. The doctors make patients feel worry for their diseases.

Dr Anirban Chakraborty can be visited for any disease except surgery cases.
Proud to have a doctor like him in India.

(Arijit Chakravarty)

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
Myself JOYANTA KUMAR POREL from KONNAGAR, HOOGHLY and I am suffering of type two diabetes. My PP level cross 354, fasting also cross 199.
I am  earching a  doctor for better treatment and from internet I search Dr. Anirban chakraborty. When I visit the doctor he prescribed two medicine only. After 2nd visit he added another one medicine which is Rs.40/- per tablet. At present I am using 3 tablets per day, Now my sugar level is under control and living a happy life. So I strongly recommend this doctor.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,
review: Myself Chandra Nath Bose from barasat and I am suffering of type two diabetes. My PP level cross 650, fasting also cross 400 so I visit a another doctor and the doctor immediate prescribed a insulin for two times(14 unit) in a day. Then I searching a another doctor for better treatment and from internet I search Dr. Anirban chakraborty. When I visit the doctor he cancel the insulin and all other medicine and prescribed a single medicine only. Now my sugar level is under control and living a happy life. So I strongly recommend this doctor.

My father got diabetes more 15 years and have other complications also, doctor treated my father so well,that now he is taking only one medicine,and his Diabetes almost gone, fasting sugar now always remain within 90 to 100. We constantly recieving his inputs whenever needed,his support team also very prompt.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
My mother has diebetes since 10yrs and since 1 yr her level was not coming down..her fasting was more than 250 and pp crossed 350 and even reached 375!
I saw this doctor thru net and within 3 days the sugar level came down to 115 and 160!i strongly recommend dis doc as he only gave 2 new medices and a diet to follow!thank u dr..
****** ** ** ****** ** ******** ** *****Sir u are great.No word is enough to tell about your treatment method.Diabetologists should consult with u before treating any diabetic patient.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: A very good and inspiring person. Not only he treats,also instigate and motivate to do better. Half of the physical problem goes away only through talking with him. Very suitable diagnosis,inspiring behaviour. Overall I am totally satisfied with his treatment.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: My husband Satyananda Mukherjee got hugely benefitted by doctor's treatment for last 1 year,my husband got uncontrolled blood sugar and depend on insulin,but within a year by only few medicine, he is now got FBS 72 yesterday in glucometer, I have done my review through online video conference,at this moment this is really helpful to get Dr.Anirban Chakraborty for online consultation.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Value for money,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
In this pandemic situation I was looking for a good doctor who is available online for my mother. Then I found him,Dr. Chakraborty is highly experienced and knowledgeable doctor I have ever seen.
My mother never got fasting sugar 115 for last 5 years,she was always have range between 250. Doctor explained all her medicine and one by one ,and give us near about 30 min in video call. It is my first experience with him,within one month my improved very much.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I am patient of Dr.Anirban Chakraborty more than 1 year.Now my present condition is very much well. Earlier I used to take 5 to 6 medicine everyday.Now very few medicine makes me feel good,as advised Dr.Chakraborty.My fasting sugar is now 92 and Hb1c 6.2 .At my age over 60 this result is quite well.I am happy with the coordinator of Lenus Clinic .I highly recommend this doctor to diabetes patient.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,

Nice cheerful personality.

He strictly asks to follow the diet chart.
Satisfied.
